user.title: Configure LinqConnect
user.description: Enter your school district and building information. You can find these IDs in the LinqConnect URL for your school.

data_description.district_id: The unique identifier for your school district (GUID format)
data_description.building_id: The unique identifier for your school building (GUID format)

select_plans.title: Select Menu Plans
select_plans.description: Choose which menu plans to track. Select all that apply to your student(s). Available plans: {available_plans}

data_description.menu_plans: Select the menu plans for your student's grade level (K-8, K-12, Pre-K, etc.)

error.invalid_auth: Invalid district or building ID. Please check and try again.
error.no_menu_plans: No menu plans found for this school. Please verify your district and building IDs.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This LinqConnect account is already configured.

data_description.menu_plans: Select which menu plans to track (K-8, K-12, Pre-K, etc.). Uncheck plans you don't need.
data_description.cutoff_time: Time after which to show the next school day's menu (e.g., 10:00)
data_description.update_interval: How often to fetch new menu data (default: 180 minutes / 3 hours)
data_description.calendar_days: How many days ahead to fetch menu data for calendar (default: 30)
